friends_1on1_outcome.answer: Tell them but be mentally prepared that it's gonna make things really awkward if they don't like you. I'm really sorry, but you should probably do it anyway for your mental clarity and for like your mental health. This is like the most movie-esque scenario that you can be in, right? If you tell your crush you like them and they're your best friend and they like you back and then, oh, you get married. Or you ruin things forever. But you never really know until you tell them, so you might as well just do it. Good luck, and tell us below what happened.
